name: asthobin
description: AsthoBin is a simple website to share pieces of code with a URL, written in Rust.

scripts.build: pnpm exec tailwindcss build -i frontend/css/index.css -o static/assets/css/index.css -c tailwind.config.js
scripts.watch: pnpm exec tailwindcss build -i frontend/css/index.css -o static/assets/css/index.css -c tailwind.config.js --watch
scripts.prod: pnpm run build && pnpm run autoprefixer && pnpm run minify

author: Asthowen <contact@asthowen.fr>
